short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forecast allows you to remove the mystery from the numbers that affect your personal and business life the most.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you're a small business owner trying to determine what your Net Income and Taxable Income will be from your business, or you're a W2 worker who wants to know what they're on pace to earn and withhold during the year, this extension is for you.

Easily run various scenarios to see where your income is projected to be, where your cash is projected to be and where your earnings will be by year-end.

For issues with the extension or if you have any suggestions for future Forecast Templates or features, please email using the contact the publisher link on the right.
